rules_text:
Flash
Vigilance
[i]Fearful[/i] – Whenever Ignatius, Frightened Knight blocks, put a shield counter onto another target blocking creature you control. [i](If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)[/i]
[i]Precautions[/i] – {T}: Until end of turn, whenever damage would be dealt to you or another creature you control, it is dealt to Ignatius instead.
